Methods in dr.evolution.colouring that return ColourChange
 ColourChange TwoColourSampler.randomConditionalMigrationEvent(int currentColour, double currentHeight, int childColour, double childHeight, double[] m)
          Samples a migration event on a two-coloured branch, conditional on colours at both ends/ Migration process is forwards in (natural) time, so we are going down the tree.

Method parameters in dr.evolution.colouring with type arguments of type ColourChange
protected  void TwoColourSampler.reverseColourChangeList(java.util.List<ColourChange> colourChanges, int parentColour)
          Reverse the migration events in a list, to convert from the natural sampling ordering (parent-to-child) to the natural coalescent ordering.
